nodes.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
nodes.title: Sleegal - Find the right lawyers instantly - free for all to use
nodes.author: Gloria Qiao

localize.description: Sleegal是一个在线市场，它使用机器学习来匹配用户和律师。我们建立这个网站供所有人免费使用，因为我们认为高质量的专业服务应该让每个人都能获得，而不仅仅是精英阶层。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合适的律师--所有人都可以免费使用。

localize.description: Sleegal是一個在線市場，它使用機器學習來匹配用戶和律師。我們建立這個網站供所有人免費使用，因爲我們認爲高質量的專業服務應該讓每個人都能獲得，而不僅僅是精英階層。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合適的律師--所有人都可以免費使用。

localize.description: Hue Sentiment是一款簡單易用的飛利浦Hue燈應用程序，它可以將文字轉化爲一種心情。只需鍵入您的心情，就會發現燈光會根據您的心情而變化。

nodes.excerpt: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.

nodes.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.

nodes.excerpt: Zoho Mail Bookmarks is integrated with your Zoho Inbox and can be accessed from anywhere. With this plugin, you can easily save any URL/ link to your Zoho Mail Bookmarks for your personal reference or to share with your team.
nodes.title: Zoho Mail Bookmarks - Save any URL link from your browser
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

localize.description: Zoho邮件书签与您的Zoho收件箱集成，可以从任何地方访问。有了这个插件，您可以轻松地将任何URL/链接保存到您的Zoho邮件书签中，供您个人参考或与您的团队分享。
localize.tagline: 从浏览器中保存任何URL链接

nodes.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
nodes.title: Articled - Write where your words matter | Read & write short stories.
nodes.author: Sajal Rai

localize.description: 对于大多数人来说，往往很难分享自己的想法，久而久之就会积压在心里，为了让大家有这些想法自由，释放自己的负担，我们建立了这个应用。在这里，每个人都可以自由写作，而不会被别人评头论足。
localize.tagline: 写在你的文字重要的地方｜阅读和写短篇小说。

localize.description: 對於大多數人來說，往往很難分享自己的想法，久而久之就會積壓在心裏，爲了讓大家有這些想法自由，釋放自己的負擔，我們建立了這個應用。在這裏，每個人都可以自由寫作，而不會被別人評頭論足。
localize.tagline: 寫在你的文字重要的地方｜閱讀和寫短篇小說。

nodes.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
nodes.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack
nodes.author: Dan Willoughby

localize.description: 别再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，为什么我们要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin让你轻松为Slack创建日程/升级策略。通过内置的用户组/@mentions与你的团队成员分担负荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自动轮流使用用户组/@mention

localize.description: 別再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，爲什麼我們要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin讓你輕鬆爲Slack創建日程/升級策略。通過內置的用戶組/@mentions與你的團隊成員分擔負荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自動輪流使用用戶組/@mention

nodes.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
nodes.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing
nodes.author: Tanjum 🔥

localize.description: 网站缺乏沟通渠道，导致客户流失，满意度低，客户成功率极低甚至为零。LiveCaller通过提供所有的解决方案来解决这些问题，它结合了网络呼叫，网络聊天，回电，社交信息应用。
localize.tagline: 免费网络通话，在线聊天，全频道和共同浏览。

localize.description: 網站缺乏溝通渠道，導致客戶流失，滿意度低，客戶成功率極低甚至爲零。LiveCaller通過提供所有的解決方案來解決這些問題，它結合了網絡呼叫，網絡聊天，回電，社交信息應用。
localize.tagline: 免費網絡通話，在線聊天，全頻道和共同瀏覽。

nodes.excerpt: Can’t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? That’s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!
nodes.title: Clipboard PRO - Fast access to all your most used content
nodes.author: Giuseppe Travasoni

localize.description: 不记得自己的银行账号保存在哪里了？需要快速访问您的简历或护照的电子版？这就是为什么我们创造了剪贴板专业版：最简单的方式来查找、复制和粘贴您的所有信息，只需轻点一下。
localize.tagline: 快速访问所有您最常用的内容

localize.description: 不記得自己的銀行賬號保存在哪裏了？需要快速訪問您的簡歷或護照的電子版？這就是爲什麼我們創造了剪貼板專業版：最簡單的方式來查找、複製和粘貼您的所有信息，只需輕點一下。
localize.tagline: 快速訪問所有您最常用的內容

nodes.excerpt: omniquotient is an assessment tool that helps you learn if you are using the tech community's recommended practices in programming, and if not, it shows you how you can improve the way you code.
nodes.title: omniquotient - Assess and grow your knowledge as a developer
nodes.author: Lenli Tuhoy

localize.description: omniquotient是一个评估工具，它可以帮助你了解你是否在编程中使用了技术社区推荐的实践，如果没有，它就会告诉你如何改进你的编码方式。
localize.tagline: 评估并增长您作为开发人员的知识

localize.description: omniquotient是一個評估工具，它可以幫助你瞭解你是否在編程中使用了技術社區推薦的實踐，如果沒有，它就會告訴你如何改進你的編碼方式。
localize.tagline: 評估並增長您作爲開發人員的知識

nodes.excerpt: Getting the perfect name for your startup is obviously important. In fact, it's the first thing people notice when visiting our brand. But... it's a pain to find a great name/domain that's available. Now, it's time to forget that pain because we're here to help you.
nodes.title: The Netly Domains - Business domain names for startups and entrepreneurs
nodes.author: Dinakar Sakthivel

localize.description: 为你的创业公司取一个完美的名字显然很重要。事实上，这是人们在访问我们的品牌时首先注意到的事情。但是......要找到一个可用的好名字/域名是一件很痛苦的事情。现在，是时候忘记这种痛苦了，因为我们是来帮助你的。
localize.tagline: 创业公司和企业家的商业域名

localize.description: 爲你的創業公司取一個完美的名字顯然很重要。事實上，這是人們在訪問我們的品牌時首先注意到的事情。但是......要找到一個可用的好名字/域名是一件很痛苦的事情。現在，是時候忘記這種痛苦了，因爲我們是來幫助你的。
localize.tagline: 創業公司和企業家的商業域名

nodes.excerpt: Trend brainstorms, deep dives into different ecosystem (including case studies and gaps in the market analyses), expert interviews, and niche market data to help founders and investors spot opportunities.
nodes.title: Opportunities.so - Deep dives, trend brainstorms, and niche data for founders

localize.description: 趋势头脑风暴，深度挖掘不同的生态系统（包括案例分析和市场分析中的差距），专家访谈和利基市场数据，帮助创始人和投资者发现机会。
localize.tagline: 为创始人提供深度挖掘、趋势头脑风暴和利基数据。

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
nodes.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 你是否发现自己在邮件中翻阅邮件线程，试图找到引入特定变更的合同版本？是谁提出的修改？是您的律师，还是您的客户？如果这种痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在这里帮助你。
localize.tagline: 律师的Git

nodes.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
nodes.title: Ponder - Daily journal from your new tab
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

localize.description: Ponder引导你在新的标签页上完成每日日记。有了自我反思的提示、快速键盘快捷键、美学背景和私人存储的条目，你只需专注于写作--Ponder 会处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 从您的新标签页的每日日记

localize.description: Ponder引導你在新的標籤頁上完成每日日記。有了自我反思的提示、快速鍵盤快捷鍵、美學背景和私人存儲的條目，你只需專注於寫作--Ponder 會處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 從您的新標籤頁的每日日記

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用

nodes.excerpt: Click2Contact helps visitors connect with sellers with a single tap connecting with customer where they connect. [Giveaway 🎉] Comment how it can help your bussiness & get a 50% off just comment and send screenshot to sanskar@click2contact.app.
nodes.title: Click2Contact - Connecting visitors to businesses with a single tap
nodes.author: Sanskar Tiwari

localize.description: Click2Contact幫助訪客與賣家建立聯繫，只需輕點一下就能與客戶建立聯繫。[贈品🎉] 評論它如何幫助你的業務，並獲得50％的折扣，只需評論併發送截圖到 sanskar@click2contact.app。
